titles.title: NO TIME TO Waste Act
New Opportunities for Technological Innovation, Mitigation, and Education To Overcome Waste Act,
NO TIME TO Waste Act
To authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out activities to reduce food loss and waste, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
